WorkItem.Description: Implement formula calculation so calculated cell values can also be used within PHP.

Comments.Message:
Implemented functions:

Array(    [0] => ABS    [1] => ACOS    [2] => ACOSH    [3] => ASIN    [4] => ASINH    [5] => ATAN    [6] => ATAN2    [7] => BIN2DEC    [8] => COS    [9] => COSH    [10] => COUNT    [11] => DEC2BIN    [12] => DEC2HEX    [13] => DEC2OCT    [14] => EXP    [15] => INT    [16] => LOG    [17] => LOG10    [18] => MAX    [19] => MAXA    [20] => MIN    [21] => MINA    [22] => MOD    [23] => OCT2DEC    [24] => PI    [25] => RAND    [26] => RANDBETWEEN    [27] => ROUND    [28] => SIN    [29] => SINH    [30] => SQRT    [31] => SUM    [32] => TAN    [33] => TANH)
